settings.heading: WE GOT ANSWERS
What is my order status?
settings.row_content: To find our your order status, tap this link and follow the instructions. If you need any further assistance, please click here to get in touch with customer service

settings.heading: How do I cancel my order?
settings.row_content: If you need to cancel your order because of any issue,contact our team immediately. We will be more than happy to help walk through the cancellation and process your refund.

settings.heading: Can I change the Product or the size of the Product after placing the order?
settings.row_content:
A Product or the size of the Product can only be changed within 12 hours from placing your order by contacting us at hi@evorayoga.com

We can change the details of the order as long as the order has not been shipped or has not proceeded past the point in production where these details can be changed. 

You can return the Product within 30 days of receiving your order without having to give any reason.

settings.heading: Can I change the shipping address?
settings.row_content:
A shipping address can only be changed within 12 hours from placing your order  by contacting us at hi@evorayoga.com. 

We can change the shipping address for you as long as the order has not been shipped or has not proceeded past the point in production where the address can be changed. 

When contacting us, it is important to provide both the updated shipping address and the order number.

settings.heading: What methods of payment do you accept?
settings.row_content: We accept Visa, MasterCard, American Express, Delta/Connect or Maestro, PayPal, and Apple Pay. We'll do our best to fix the issue and keep you posted if the change in address isn't possible.

settings.heading: What can I do if something is wrong with my order?
settings.row_content: Contact our customer service team and they'll do their very best to make things right as quickly as possible.

settings.heading: Ordering
Do you ship internationally?
settings.row_content:
Expect your order to be delivered within 2 to 14 business days in the European Union. Keep in mind, our prices don't include any import duties or extra fees that your destination country may apply.

Shipping times are based on our best estimate, however, delays can occur in transit or due to holds at your local customs office, so it may take longer for an order to be delivered.

Please ensure to provide a correct shipping address to avoid any additional delays.
A 30-day return policy is in place to ensure your complete satisfaction with the purchase.

settings.heading: How does the delivery process work?
settings.row_content:
Expect your order to be delivered within 2-14 business days, we do our best to reduce it.

Shipping times are based on our best estimate, however, delays can occur in transit or due to holds at your local customs office, so it may take longer for an order to be delivered.

Please ensure to provide a correct shipping address to avoid any additional delays.
A 30-day return policy is in place to ensure your complete satisfaction with the purchase.

settings.heading: What are the available shipping options?
settings.row_content:
Discover our shipping alternatives: Regular, offering 1-14 days standard delivery, and Express delivery within 1-2 business days in the EU (not available actually).

Tailor your shipping experience to your needs by choosing the option that suits your schedule and preferences.

settings.heading: Why is my order not being delivered in the estimated time?
settings.row_content:
If the expected delivery date has already passed, we kindly request a few additional days for your order to arrive, especially during peak holiday seasons.

If your order has yet to reach you, please don't hesitate to contact our customer support team at hi@evorayoga.com.

You can also track your order's progress by clicking on mail that you receive during your order.

settings.heading: Missing Package(s) or Item(s)?
settings.row_content:
If you have an item missing from your order, start by double-checking the items you selected when placing your order. You can review your order details in your account or your confirmation email.

If it’s been over 24 hours since your package was marked as delivered and you still haven’t received it, or if an item is missing from your package, we’re here to assist. Simply contact our support team via hi@evorayoga.com

Please note Evora does not hold responsibility for packages that have been reported as delivered by the carrier.

settings.heading: Delivery
How do I return something if I need to?
settings.row_content:
We're happy to offer a refund on items in perfect condition that have proof of purchase and not used. You have to return them within 30 days from the date of delivery.

If you receive an item that’s different from what you ordered, please feel free to contact our support team for help. They'll make sure the issue is resolved as soon as possible. It may take up to 24-48 hours to process your request.

settings.heading: What can I return?
settings.row_content:
Products must be returned unworn, unwashed, in their original condition, and with all tags and liners attached. In order to receive a full refund, products must be returned in suitable packaging. The items must not be used, worn, or damaged, other than what is necessary to establish the nature, characteristics, and functioning of the products.

Please note: Subject to your right to cancel and your statutory rights, certain products, such as underwear opened from its original packaging may be excluded from return.

settings.heading: How to request a refund?
settings.row_content:
You must meet all the following conditions:

  1. You need to contact us at hi@evorayoga.com indicating the following details: name; order number; reason for refund; and 
  2. Return the Product in brand new condition, including all parts included in its original state, no later than 30 calendar days from the date of delivery. 
  3. Apparel shall have the original tags attached and shall be unwashed and unworn. 

Please note that depending on your location, we may not refund original shipping charges.

settings.heading: Will I be notified about the refund?
settings.row_content: After we receive your request, you'll get a confirmation email. We’ll then process your refund within 5 business days.

settings.heading: Returns
Do you have a size guide?
settings.row_content: The easiest way is to find the size guide on the product card that interests you.

settings.heading: What are the measurements for leggings?
settings.row_content: The measurements can vary between styles. The best way to find your perfect fit is to look through the specific product page.

settings.heading: Fit & Sizes
Do you have washing instructions?
settings.row_content: All our clothes have washing guidelines, but here's one quick tip: don't wash technical fabrics with fabric conditioner as it will clog up the pores and stop sweat from "wicking" away. For more information head to the specific product page.
